article_title: Editorial board endorsements: Ross, Burr best for U.S. Senate
article_text:
Seven candidates seek to topple incumbent Republican Richard Burr

Burr and Democrat Deborah Ross are the best choices for the nominations

Spring Lake Mayor Chris Rey also impressive

article_metadata.news-keywords: North Carolina, U.S. Senate, Deborah Ross, Richard Burr, Chris Rey, Holmquist, Wright, Brannon, Griffin, Reeves
article_metadata.description: Despite nearly 22 years in Congress, including the past 12 as a U.S. senator, North Carolina’s Richard Burr is not so well-known in his home state. Because of that, many pundits thought the Republican from Winston-Salem might be vulnerable in his reelection bid this year.
article_metadata.title: Editorial board endorsements: Ross, Burr best for U.S. Senate | The Charlotte Observer
